text:
I don't know how I'd have survived chemical engineering without you. Most of my daytime spent in academic area has been with you. From our shared courses to shared bad luck, we were together in everything. Spending nights in NCL/CC to arranging (doing :P) assignments to mutually hating profs, last three years were fun with you.
I hope we keep on having more things in common and apne haath ka khana banakar khila de plisðŸ¥º
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Abhishek!
True that we didn't get to interact much inspite of so many common things but it was quite easy to be comfortable around you.
You're really a nice person and it was a pleasure to interact with you. Holi was fun because of you people being there. I wish you all the very best for your future and do hope our paths cross again.
Take care :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
One of my first good friends in HSS.
Thanks for all the good memories of freshers' night and treasure hunt.
Wish you lots of happiness and success.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
One of the sweetest people I've met at IITK. Thanks for all the help in Microeconomics (though I ended up dropping that course XD).
Really loved the quarantine bulla session and of course that crazy night when you were late to the party :P
Stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: You're one of the most sincere and dedicated people in our department. Glad that we were in the same group in ESO205 lab. I wish you the very best for your future and hope you do wonders in chemical engineering.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: The first girl I met at Hall 6 ka gate on day 1 :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Aanshhhikaaa brooo,
Assignment kar liya kya???

You're an amazing person and it's always fun to be around you. Chemical buddies to MnP partners, I share many memories with you.
Stay in touch and Lucknow-Kanpur to anyway close hi hain.
Lotsss of love and best wishes <3

PS: My bucket's gonna miss you ;_;
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Thanks for all the gossips and teeps and treecks during CPA. You made spending time on ground fun and i love how we maintained that connection until the very end.
Take care and let's meet soon <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Hello Jhunjhun!
The chaapu girl with a reaction time of microseconds. You are hands down the bravest chhipkali fighter I've ever seen _/\_
Stay sassy and badassy <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Monikaaaaa
Athletics wali ladki!
You're super talented and amazing. Glad that i got to know you from the very beginning and shared a lot of memories.
Wish you all the success in life and keep smiling.
Let's meet soon and do more perpendicular twinning <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
The sweet, lovely, and helpful girl. It was always a pleasure interacting with you.
Also, Photoshoot was reallyyy fun.
Wish you lots of success and stay in touch.
You da besst<3 !!!
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Pro stone skipper _/\_
It was nice hanging out with you people in the final days on campus.
Couldn't ask for a better teammate in pictionary :P
All the best for future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Ashutosh!
You're a really sweet person and also quite talented from what i know of you. It's been a pleasure knowing you and i wish we got to interact more.
Have a great future ahead and take care :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo class representative!
That UNO night was fun. Also we somehow kinda rocked our Colloids project lol.
Wish you the best for future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Avani!
Love how you always keep smiling and cheering up people around you.
Lol i remember how we fucked up the initial few labs of TA201 together and how you called Anshika back from CC after hearing someone crying outside your room at 2am (that definitely scared us all XD).
Stay the happy soul you are <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Lol remember how we spent the last normal evening on campus running around IR and UG Office for nothing.
You've been very helpful and friendly. We couldn't go on our internship together but i hope we'll get to interact more in the coming year.
Wish you the best for future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
I think we were in the same sections in almost all our common courses over the four years but we finally got to interact properly during Design project.
Thanks for making that project possible. You are one of the nicest and most helpful guys and I'm glad meeting you.
Wish you the best for future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Remember that photoshoot we did in front of the black structure during orientation XD.
Absolutely loved your raids in B608 and A207. You're one of the coolest people and fun to be around.
Glad that we have one more year to make some memories. Let's come back soon and party in Pragya's tent.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
It was always difficult catching up with you in PE.
Loved our random conversations. Still in awe of how you got that lizard out of Riya's room.
All the very best for your future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
My ESC101 lab benchmate and bitching partner<3. I can't thank you enough for making the PE sessions and CHM lab bearable (fun actually).
Stay in touch :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Esha!
You are so sweet and lovely. I absolutely loved our small interactions throughout these four years. I remember you telling me tujhe ghar kyun jana hai in first year and it made no sense to me (it does now :p )
You are chaapu and i wish you achieve great heights. 
Good luck <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
I remember playing dodgeball (ig?) against you as captain of one of the teams during orientation games.
'The strong girl of my batch' is how I'm gonna remember you and that includes chugging neat pegs XD. Absolutely love your energy and enthusiasm.
Wish you the best for future <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Thanks for supplying notes and assignments and keeping our chemical group lively. Pillai sir wala project was fun.
You're gonna do wonders in chemical engineering. Wish you the best for future!! 

Also, you have a beautiful handwriting.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Inshu!
You're so strong and full of enthusiasm. It was always nice interacting with you since you always had positive and lively vibes.
Wish you the best and stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Jaya!
Remember how we discussed our common allergies the first time we talked during CPA trials. 
Knocking on each other's door anytime to discussing random doubts, you are no doubt an unforgettable part of my UG journey at IITK.
I absolutely admire your focus and dedication and I know you're gonna achieve a lot in life.
Good luck and stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
White headband, red hair tie, and the shrill voice which silenced everyone during freshers' practice in first year- that's how I'm always gonna remember you.
Our common trips to the washroom and your 'Hello Deeeksha' with that trademark smile comprised most of our interactions all these years.
You're really dedicated and full of surprises. Wish you the best for future!
Hoping to see you soon.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Kuldeep!
Topmost stair of OAT. A group of 4 people, 3 sitting, one standing and waving at me in the darkness.
This is my first memory of you at IITK.
We clicked instantly and have been in constant touch since then, and it feels really great to have a friend who hypes you up for no reason at all.
I can never forget the moment I entered an 8 am class in summer to find huge 'Happy Birthday Deeksha' written on blackboard. That was cutest and i can't be thankful enough.
You're so full of surprises and your dedication inspires me. TA project was really memorable with you.
We made great memories in last months at IITK and also had the strangest (illegal too XD) goodbye in campus, but that was obviously not the end. Abhi to Kanpur aate rehna hai tumhe and trips pe bhi jaana hai saath mein.
Wish you lots of success and happiness ahead.
Aise hi chaapte rehna!!!
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo roomie!
The cutie who used to get up and take a bath at 8 am everyday.
The one who slept with socks on (even in summer) to avoid catching cold.
The one who remained troubled about a lot of things but still kept calm.
Remember how we bought chocolates for all the girls on your birthday but then ended up eating them ourselves.
We couldn't stay much in touch after first semester but it always felt home-like whenever we talked. Mess table meetings in the final sem were lovely <3 

Wish you all the very best for future!!!
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: MAD
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: DAM
author: Deeksha  Yadav

Okay no spemming this time.
I know we haven't spent much time hanging out together but it never feels so whenever you're around.
You are so fun and friendly (adventurous too) and i absolutely love your vibes.
Wish we could explore more scary rooftops with cats climbing trees and branches breaking out of nowhere (damn that night was insane).
Wish you all the very best for future and touch mein rehna.
Keep spamming <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo à¤Ÿà¤Ÿà¥à¤Ÿà¥‚!!!
So many memories together, it's hard to pick what to write here.
Orientation group photo competition to galaxy, we've shared many days and nights of brainstorming.
HSS Galaxy'19 is one of my fondest memories on campus and I'll always remember the time we spent in your room and conference room. We made such a great team in Gupchup<3. Also thank you for bearing my impatience in the submission hoursðŸ¥º.
Banaras would always remind me of you and your AMAZZZINGGG sense of humour.
Milte rehna yaar.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
One of the people I've known longest in IITK <3
You're the reason I've tasted a lot of restaurant and canteen 'daals' (not complaining XD). Thanks for being the ever-encouraging, sensible, inspiring friend.
From freshers' to X-Coordinates, we've come a looong way and hope this connection stays forever. 
I know you'll achieve great heights (famous hokar bhoolna mat :P) and wish you the very best!!!

author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
The chulbuli girl who clicks with anyone almost instantly. I love how you always passed a sweet smile with a 'Yo Deeksha' whenever we met anywhere.
Gossipping with you and listening to random stories (also bhoot wali) was sooo much fun. You're absolutely one of the best people to have a bulla session with.
Take care and stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: ribbit ribbitðŸ¸
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
The confident multi-talented girl with a hella charming personality.
Can't forget how you patiently helped me with "hello world" in the first ESC lab.
I hope we get to meet again, saath mein will do more backrolls and hoolahoop dances.
All the very best for your future! 

From- Teri behen ki doppelganger.
PS: Keep making those dance reels, absolutely love them <3

I really admire your dedication and enthusiasm for your work. You're a nice and friendly person and always a good company.
Keep doing what you love and wish you the very best for future :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Bhavita!
We couldn't interact a lot after first year but you were one of my first neighbours and course-rant-on-mess-table partners.
All the best for future and take care <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Nikks!
Bumping into you in canteen, mess, and other random locations was always nice.
Holi was fun and we finally got to do our all (not really) girls photoshoot, yaaay!
All the best for future and stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Niteshhhhhhhh...
Thanks for tolerating me for these 4 years (and aage bhi). You're the best neighbour and behen i could've asked for. I don't know how I'd stay motivated in my life without your "chal na, tera to roz ka hai".ðŸ¥º
You've been a motivation, a shoulder to cry on, and imma miss rote rote tere room pe aana.
Officer banke bhool mat jana. Also, teri sarkari kamaayi mein aadha share mera bhi rahega, okay!?
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Nupurrr! Brooo!
Sun!
(Suna)
I remember the first time we talked was to discuss your sexxxyyy haircut during group photography competition in orientation.
Fast forward 4 years, we are drunk and still discussing but not just haircuts *ahem*.
I'm soo gonna miss the "saath mein padhte hain yaar and padha dena" before every exam and then failing to execute it every single time. (Except Eng123 ofc, but usme bhi kahan hi padhe the :P)
TA 202 lab was fun with you being in my group. Also, Harry Potter is changed for me forever XD.
Planning and executing photoshoots was really fun and thanks for recommending that lipstick :*
Wish we could have gotten more chances to eat sandwiches in Priya's room at 2am but abhi to you'll be visiting *me* in the campus one more year. So, we'll have some more incidents of the coincidental trio. 

Until then, take care and stay in touch.
Also, vodka hurtssss. 

Tata!
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Palak!
Ritambhara mein saath kaam karna was fun. Lift ke bahar wale random meetups and small talks were really nice.
Tu bohot mast insaan hai and i wish you stay the same.
Lots of love and all the best <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
The Shashi Tharoor of HSS!
Big fan sir _/\_ 

Remember how we fucked up our ENG project and even the nightout at CCD couldn't save it.
The club trips, the galaxy nights, the movie outings, it was all fun with you. I love those deep informative discussions and I'm completely astounded by the amount of information you have on almost every subject.
You are already a professional writer for me and yes again, biggg fan sir.
Despite being together in so many things, it's a tradegy that we did not get to spend enough time together in campus. But we still have one more year and a lifetime too.Â  

Looking forward to receiving signed copies of your books.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yoo neighbour!
I really love the sweet smile you greet everyone with.
We've spent amazing times at IITK together, from fest nights to random gossip and makeover sessions in A206. 
There's always a home-like vibe around you which makes me comfortable enough to be my true self :P
See you soon and let's have lots of fun when we meet <33
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Subarashii!
Sabse pehle to meet me soon plis.
From sleeping on rooftops to tripping MCBs, i really miss the 'cool stuff' we've done together. Bohot saara cool stuff karna baaki hai abhi wapas aakar :P
Having you as my roommate was the highest my kismat graph went at IITK. I want to write a lot so imma send you a letter later. Until then, Canteen Chalein?
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Pragyaaaaaaaaaaaa
B608, Kaaaafi, Kraaanti, Nasl, Tiddy dal, Eeh, Kids, Band karo, Murphy, F, 69%, Kawaii, Ew, Structured rr, Hathoda, plants, Bas thoda aur, Stonehenge, Dead Scientists, WAP, A207, Baabu, Kokh...
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text: STANDARD
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo gossip buddy!
I remember knowing you from coaching days but we interacted mainly after messing up the semi-automatic garage door opener (oof). 
Thanks for sharing panic before every exam and always being the go-to person in need.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
The adopted behen!
The one who raids your room to find snacks. The one who tells you not to freak out if you find her sneaking through semi-shut door at midnight to drink water from your bottle.
The bubbly and long-legged multi-talented Photoshoot-planner.
Stay jhakaas and crackly :P
Lots of love <3<3 !
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Pratyush!
Remember "has lo, do thahake aur maar lo"?
Glad that I got to know you through HSS. Good wishes for the future and take care.
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
One look at you during orientation and I go Ooo she's the Kanpur jee main topper _/\_
Lifts ke bahar milna and our random "tu ghar gayi thi/ jaa rahi kya" conversations.
I know you're gonna make our city proud and wish you the very best for it.
Stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Priyakheeee!!!
Always had fun interacting with you. You're nice and sweet (brave too, chhipkali fighter lol).
Can't get over that photo of you posing as don XD.
Keep spreading your cuteness and stay in touch <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

author: Deeksha  Yadav

author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Memoir no. 69
NICE!!!

Yo PP! (not the regular one)
Who'd have thought a hoolahoop sticker could turn into a lifelong bond, but here you are, stuck with the weirdo! Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯ 

We went to Delhi as club secys but came back as friends. And then, there was no looking back. I wonder if anyone else has troubled you more in your campus life than me. (â”€â€¿â€¿â”€)
Like you said, there are innumerous memories and mentioning a few here would be injustice to others, so I'd use this memoir to thank you for being an amazing friend.
I've been really mean a lot of times (sowwy), but you never gave up on me and I can't thank you enough for that.
Thanks for supporting me throughout and believing in me even in the worst of times.
Thanks for the unlimited supply of memes, stickers, and gossips.
Thanks for being the friend i needed but never deserved <3
Kaafi mushy ho gaya ðŸ¤¢ but okay!
And no, you're not going to die anytime soon so stop being nihilist and start preparing for your wedding (remember that shaadi.com wali) ðŸ¥³
Also, shaadi mein zaroor bulaana ðŸ¥º 

P.S. Atheist Pulkit Pandey is real?
P.P.S. If you're reading this, Chai?
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Thanks for helping me with ESC101 codes at 10 am in the morning.
You're really a very sweet and kind person and it's been a pleasure knowing you.
We couldn't interact a lot as chemical UGs but you do know now whom I'm gonna pester the entire next year ;)
See you soon <3
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo!
Finally got that 631 project done. Haven't interacted much other than for CRE, but hope to make some memories in the coming year.
All the best :)
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yooo sun na *pictures smiling Ritika*
My first padosan!!!
You're one of the friends i get along very well with and it always feels home-like around you evertime we talk or meet.
E-Cell, Ritambhara to sleepless nights of Numerical Methods to ranting about internships (and now placements), we've been constant companions.
I really admire your helpful, cooperative, and sweet nature. And yes, dedication of course.
Abhi to 1 saal aur hai. Hope I get more chances to put jhumka in your earlobes :P
Love you<33
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo fellow kanpuRIYA!
The number of times we were together (in very close proximity) before coming to IITK is just strange and amazing. I love how we find more common things between us everytime we meet.
We have a sleepover and nail art session due. So, let's meet soon and stay in touch humesha. 
Also, shaadi mein zaroor bulana :P â¤ï¸
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Aaloo-pyaaz paratha with butter-dahi.
Also, never forget who showed you your Gulmohar treeðŸ˜Œ

author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Yo Sunmaya!
IITK se teen teen streams mein 'engineering' karne ki badhayi. Thanks for helping me survive chemical engineering and always collecting the marks stats for all of us :P. It's really fun being around you and getting 'updates' about campus.
"Kuchh nahi padha" kehkar scoring highest in every exam, you've always been full of surprises for me. Just keep the swag and savagery on forever. Also, I want to thank your alarm for helping me stay awake for breakfast in the morning hours after a nightout. 
Also class mein mere se bhi late aane ke liye bahut bahut shukriya <33
Love you :*
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
I'm sure we have spent good enough time together in washrooms or in the corridors while going to washrooms.
You were one of my first neighbours at IITK. The calm and quiet girl who's absolutely a bombshell. You're so talented and i love your carefree and cool vibes.
Wish you the best for your future and stay connected.
Would love to see you in bangs someday :P
author: Deeksha  Yadav

text:
Smiling Swati in orientation to teary-eyed smiling Swati on the last day in campus. You're the person who can bond with anyone in no time and I absolutely adore you for that.
Loved dressing up and planning photoshoots with you. The times spent together during last days on campus were great.
Wish you all the very best for future and stay chirpy <3
